title: TPEML teams up with TPREL to accelerate adoption of rooftop systems, EVs
description: Tata Power plans to aggressively promote solar rooftop adoption through its extensive network of over 700 channel partners and retailers to cover the pan-India market. The company has installed over 1 lakh home chargers and 5,600 public chargers across India, the statement said.
